resources.string: If you were interested in supporting us, ping organizers Roxy or Anna on our slack

As community of volunteers we work with external speakers and tutors.\nOur meetups are possible not only thanks to us but also thanks to the wonderful support, that we receive from Google and companies that are listed below. This is our contribution to making Berlin\'s tech scene diverse and inclusive!
Organizers and community members about WTMB
Women Techmakers Berlin is part of the global \nWomen Techmakers program run by Google.

At WTM Berlin we are encouraging diversity in tech in Berlin since 2015. Get visibility, networking and resources to make the tech community of Berlin diverse and inclusive! We have different activities: intense coding study groups, workshops or technical topics or social skills as well as inspirational fireside chats. New and existing members are always welcome to all of the events, and all events are always opened for everyone, regardless of your gender/age/race/experience, etc. We follow the Berlin code of conduct for communities: http://berlincodeofconduct.org
No upcoming events at the moment. Stay tuned!
We are active across social media!
You can find all our events on Meetup.

Slack is one of the main parts of our Community - it is a good place to connect with other members, offer positions in #jobs that reach more diverse audience or announce free/discounted diversity tickets.
There is also a facebook group and a page.
